item.title: Anything That's Part Of You
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → ~~~ May 2020 ~~~ Playlist by Seattle-based photographer and macrame artist Melissa Kagerer ~~~ Dreams by Colleen, IMDB research by Mave ~~~ ໒( ♥ ◡ ♥ )७ ~♪ ~~~ ANGELS They have little use. They are best as objects of torment. No government cares what you do with them.

item.title: Put Your Hand In The Hand
Put Your Hand In The Hand
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → We are here to ruin ourselves and break our hearts and love the wrong people and die ~ Nicolas Cage in Moonstruck With a playlist and recipes from Noël Morical Recipes

item.title: Slowly, As I Leave You
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → ko.yaa.nis.qatsi (from the Hopi language), n. 1. crazy life 2. life in turmoil 3. life disintegrating 4. life out of balance 5. a state of life that calls for another way of living We made this eZine at the start of Gemini Season 2020 (~￣³￣)~ Caroline Belle Stewart’s stories can or soon will be found in Fairy Tale Review, Black Warrior Review, Quarterly West, Hobart, No Tokens, and elsewhere.

item.title: Blue Moon
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → Essentials March - April 2020 In Memory of Bevin Instant coffee (Two Bulk Tins), Italian Roast and Decaf Everything Bagels from Maury’s VHS copy of Alec Baldwin’s The Shadow from Ebay Vintage OOmphies Green Furry House Slippers

item.title: Earth Angel
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → Zoe Rana Mungin Forever Wings of Desire • City of Angels Mave’s dream on 4.27.20 • a poem called Clouds by Colleen April 2020 -- -- -- -- I was on vacation in Berlin with three other women.

item.title: THIS IS MY HEAVEN
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → Dedicated to Nicolas Cage Poem by Patty Gone April-May 2020 A man is attractive at only two moments In his entire life -- -- -- -- -- One
